action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a series of colored blocks arranged in a specific pattern. There are green blocks forming an "H" shape, a purple block in the center, and a pink block on the right side. Additionally, there are orange blocks scattered throughout the image.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a series of colored shapes arranged in a specific pattern. There are red shapes resembling letters, a yellow cross, and a purple shape that looks like a letter. The arrangement of these shapes forms a larger pattern.
